name: Flounder in Orange Sauce With Pine Nuts
keywords: flounder fillets, pine nuts, raisins, low-fat, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil plus a few drops

recipeInstructions.text: Heat broiler. Arrange fish on broiler pan and rub them with a few drops of oil. Broil about 2 inches from source of heat, 4 to 5 minutes, depending on thickness of fillets. Do not turn them.

Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in small skillet. Saute raisins and pine nuts over medium heat 2 to 3 minutes, until nuts begin to color. Stir in orange juice concentrate, lemon juice and water and simmer to heat.
When fish is cooked, arrange on serving plates and spoon sauce over. Sprinkle with parsley.
